sentences.sContent: Please let us know if you are unable to attend.
sentences.sCn: 如果不能出席，请通知我们。

sentences.sContent: On his deathbed the General was attended by several doctors.
sentences.sCn: 将军临终时有几名医生在照料他。

sentences.sContent: ...I'm expected to attend too many meetings and I seem to be spending a lot of my time doing unnecessary paper work...
...What do the people who attend the class do in the first part of the lesson...
...Why did the man want to attend to the class...
...Why couldn’t the woman’s roommate attend the Shakespearean English class that afternoon...
...She’s afraid she won’t be able to attend your class this afternoon though...
...being invited to attend the opening ceremony...
...In order to ensure him to attend the meeting88...
...Please let everybody know that whoever wants to may attend the funeral...

synos.tran: 出席；上（大学等）；照料；招待；陪伴

words.tran: 出席者；按规定常到的人；常客

trans.tranOther: to go to an event such as a meeting or a class
